Reviews.Title: “A Bargain in Downtown LA”
Reviews.Author: AZ4Now
Reviews.Content: recent visits downtown la meetings looking decent reasonable price comfort inn fills bill nicely building signs pretty maintained appeared recently refurbished requested 2nd 3rd floor little quieter found staff pleasant accommodating particularly pleased cleaned free wifi signal strength days connecting lobby included breakfast expected juice cereal muffins bagels etc plus waffle maker nice extra breakfast fairly crowded usually ate soon 630am neighborhood lot people probably late evening stroll wife walked nearby restaurants concerns afternoon shops street market atmosphere seen overseas couple restaurants liked deli corner 7th alvarado breakfast lunch fairly expensive food heading east 7th distance little cesars carry pizza left delightful bakery cafe la dolce 7th la dolce vita serves salads sandwiches pasta dishes addition espresso specialty drinks favorite spot dinner stay downtown la reasonable price comfort inn worth considering

Reviews.Content: cramped beds instead built 1 fancy feet move window shut called front desk person duty front desk girl tried figure needless told wait day dealt bedspreads stains carpet cleaning breakfast move sit beware charge day park car uncovered parking lot

Reviews.Content: comfort inn price close convention center attended day neighborhood isnt parking secure appointed bed comfortable theres adequate continental breakfast downstairs nice warm pool relax main complaint internet access unfortunately wifi lounge stay close downtown 150 night

Reviews.Content: arrived hotel knowing located bad la worst doors outside shut lock access halls elevator unsafe keys keys day horrible tvs color completely messed bed brown stain shower dirty lockbox broken parking lot night park wifi connection horrible slow comfort inn provided comfort
